content.rendered:
Pearl View, Calabar, Cross River

Pearl View, Calabar is an estate in Anyanganse, Akpabuyo LGA, Calabar, Cross River State, surrounded by the serenity and ambiance of the state. The estate is well-landscaped, secure, and has a good number of tourist attractions nearby.

The estate is completely dry and is situated in a rapidly developing area along the road, and ensures a high rate of Return on Investment.

LANDMARK:

  • Along MCC Road, just 17km away from Transcorp Metropolitan Hotel Calabar
  • UNICEM and Dangote Factories o Effio-Ette roundabout

PROXIMITY:

  • Along MCC Road, just 17km away from Transcorp Metropolitan Hotel Calabar
  • 8km from the new airport bypass
  • 15km from UNICEM and Dangote Factories o 10km from Effio-Ette roundabout

TOPOGRAPHY: Pearl View, Calabar is 100% dry

DOCUMENT TITLE: Customary Right of Rural Occupancy

COORDINATES: 435127.913mE, 557806.978mN

ESTATE FEATURES:

  • Fence and gated house
  • Good road network and street light
  • Accessible and conducive environment
  • A buy and build land o Instant plot allocation

PRICE:

464SQM:
Actual price – ₦1, 800,000
Promo price – ₦1, 500,000

928SQM:
Actual price: ₦3, 000,000
Promo price: ₦2, 800,000

VIDEOS:
